If anyone is having issues at startup about a Debug error message, use this masterbase instead of the one located in the .torrent.

This could be an isolated issue on my end, but I figured I'd share.

http://www.slightlymagic.net/component/remository/func-startdown/6/

I'm seeding.  Works very smoothly, No problem at all!!!
